root.name: R-Type Command
root.description: GameplayIts OOOONR-Type Command features a total of 58 levels, in which the player uses a army of R-Type untits to combat the Bydo.Although the shoot-em up nature of the gameplay has been removed and replaced in favour of a more tactical turnbased engine the side scrolling hallmark of the genre remains. Ships start at the right and enemy objectives are always in the far right of the screen. Attacks can only be performed in a left to right direction because of this.R-Type command contains more than 100 different units including many of the fighters seen from previous titles. Each fighter has its own unique abilitys in the form of movement and attack abilitys. During the progress of the game players can aquire abilitys that can upgrade units within his army.
